name: You Cannot Go Back!
description:
You Cannot Go Back is a quick-to-play adventure game which will test your memory, skill, and reflexes. 

Can you make it through all three levels of the dungeon alive, and escape with the treasure? Or will a nasty fate befall you?

Just remember dungeoneer - the only way is onwards; you cannot go back!

Game features:

  • Quick to play: each game lasts less than 5 minutes
  • Random three-level dungeons of up to 36 chambers total
  • Three-button control scheme: Up, Down, or Straight On (there is no Back button!)
  • Music & effects
  • Playable in both Landscape or Portrait modes 
  • 15 different chamber types with increased difficulty at higher levels, including
    • Puzzle Chambers
    • Action Chambers
    • Memory Recall Chambers
  • Challenges short-term recall
    • With up to 5 clues to remember at any one time
    • Any one of which may be needed to proceed

Asset credits:

  • Pebble release promotional Art: Frank Martinez Jr.
  • Top down dungeon tileset by Buch
  • Gold treasure by Clint Bellanger
  • Powers icons by Clint Bellanger
  • Blocky animated classic hero by Umz
  • Dead forest pixel art by deepglowing
  • 8bit Dungeon Boss by Kevin MacLeod
  • 8bit Dungeon Level by Kevin MacLeod
  • Buzzsaw Addiction by AaronGNP
    • 8-Bit Sound Effects Library by LittleRobotSoundFactory
  • Fuse by soundslikewillem
  • Walk down stairs by qubodup

Build:

Version 1 of You Cannot Go Back is compiled for Playdate devices and the Playdate Linux Simulator.
